title: Stuck on "game is still in progress"
body: So I played a game and won. After that the client wouldn't show the stats so I skipped. Then It said to rejoin the game. The game was done so there was nothing to rejoin and now I'm stuck with this and can't start a new game. Riot plz.

replies.body: This sounds like a ghost game issue currently going on.  Bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for updates as we continue investigating.
